chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
z: pos n
y: pos n
x: pos n
Hxy: x <> y
Hxz: x <> z
Hyz: y <> z
i: nat
l: list bool
w: Vector.t (list bool) n
v: Vector.t (list bool) n

Goal:
v#>x = l -> v#>z = nil -> w = v[(l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, copy_stack) // (i, v) ->> (16 + i, w)

Premises:
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, pos (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, pos n -> pos (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
copy_stack = move_rev_stack x z i ++ copy_rev_stack z x y (7 + i) : list (bsm_instr n)
Notation pos := Fin.t
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Module Vector := Struct Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, t A n -> t A (S n) Definition t_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Type), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t)) -> forall (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t. Definition t_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : forall n : nat, vec A n -> Prop), P 0 vec_nil -> (forall (h : A) (n : nat) (t : vec A n), P n t -> P (S n) (h ## t))
move_rev_stack_spec : forall x y : pos n, x <> y -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y] -> (i, move_rev_stack x y i) // (i, v) -> > (7 + i, w)
copy_rev_stack_spec : forall x y z : pos n, x <> y -> x <> z -> y <> z -> forall (i : nat) (l : list bool) (v w : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = l -> w = v[nil/x][(rev l ++ v#>y)/y][(rev l ++ v#>z)/z] -> (i, copy_rev_stack x y z i) // (i, v) -> > (9 + i, w)
bsm_steps_POP_any_inv : forall (n a : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (b : bool) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = b :: ll -> p = 1 + i -> st <> (i, v) -> P // (i, v) -[a] -> st -> {b0 : nat | b0 < a /\ P // (1 + i, v[ll/x]) -[b0] -> st}

bsm_compute_POP_0 : forall (n : nat) (P : nat * list (bsm_instr n)) (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (ll : list bool) (v : vec (list bool) n) (st : nat * vec (list bool) n), (i, POP x p q :: nil) <sc P -> v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P // (p, v[ll/x]) -> > st -> P // (i, v) -> > st

VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) ->...-> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n z : pos n Hxy : x <> y Hxz : x <> z Hyz : y <> z i : nat l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n z : pos n Hxy : x <> y Hxz : x <> z Hyz : y <> z i : nat l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n z : pos n Hxy : x <> y Hxz : x <> z Hyz : y <> z i : nat l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type]

bsm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : bsm_instr n -> bsm_state n -> bsm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n), v#>x = nil -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (q, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = Zero :: ll -> P (POP x p q) (i, v) (p, v[ll/x])) ->...-> P b b0 b1

VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v0 : vec ?A (S ?n)) (P : vec ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : vec ?A ?n), P (h ## t)) -> P v0 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n z : pos n Hxy : x <> y Hxz : x <> z Hyz : y <> z i : nat l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?n : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n z : pos n Hxy : x <> y Hxz : x <> z Hyz : y <> z i : nat l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- nat]
in_bsm_sss_pop_1 : forall (n i : nat) (x : pos n) (p q : nat) (v : vec (list bool) n) (ll : list bool), v#>x = One :: ll -> bsm_sss (POP x p q) (i, v) (1 + i, v[ll/x])

VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> Type, P 0 vec_nil vec_nil ->...-> forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : vec ?A n0) (v2 : vec ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n z : pos n Hxy : x <> y Hxz : x <> z Hyz : y <> z i : nat l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n z : pos n Hxy : x <> y Hxz : x <> z Hyz : y <> z i : nat l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type]
VectorEq.eq_dec : forall (A : Type) (A_beq : A -> A -> bool), (forall x y : A, A_beq x y = One <-> x = y) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 v2 : vec A n), {v1 = v2} + {v1 <> v2}
BinInt.Z.le = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : vec ?A n0), P n0 (h ## t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [n : nat x : pos n y : pos n z : pos n Hxy : x <> y Hxz : x <> z Hyz : y <> z i : nat l : list bool v : vec (list bool) n w : vec (list bool) n |- Type]

```coq
 intros.
 destruct v#>x eqn:vx.
 - apply bsm_compute_POP_E with (i:=i) (x:=x) (p:=p) (q:=q) (v:=v); auto.
 - destruct l eqn:ll.
   + apply bsm_compute_POP_1 with (i:=i) (x:=x) (p:=p) (q:=q) (v:=v); auto.
   + apply bsm_compute_POP_0 with (i:=i) (x:=x) (p:=p) (q:=q) (v:=v); auto.
apply bsm_steps_POP_any_inv with (i:=i) (x:=x) (p:=p) (q:=q) (b:=b) (ll:=l) (v:=v); auto.
rewrite vx; auto.
Qed.
